Class InstancesHeader

java.lang.Object

              moa.core.InstancesHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<weka.core.Instance>, Collection<weka.core.Instance>, List<weka.core.Instance>, weka.core.RevisionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultilabelInstancesHeader
public class InstancesHeader
extends weka.core.Instances

Class for storing the header or context of a data stream. It allows to know the number of attributes and classes.

Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
See Also:
Serialized Form
